summary.value: If knowledge is power, I’ve got bad news for you.

system.description:
ALSO: Mesmerist, Prestidigitator, Trickster

Illusionists are masters of deception and manipulation, blurring the lines of reality to protect their allies and disorient their foes. Thriving on uncertainty, their presence on the battlefield is marked by unpredictability, sowing chaos across the enemy lines.

But an Illusionist's powers go beyond mere trickery: they can conjure material Phantasms, sending these mindless doppelgangers into the fray on their behalf.

ILLUSIONIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.
  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Ritualism discipline.

ILLUSIONIST SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.ZpNXTYGxw6xMWkmY]{Illusionist Magic} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Illusionist spell.

Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Illusionist spells and Phantasm use 【INS + WLP】 for their Checks.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.RH2J6woo98YWM0W3]{Phantasmal Echo} (SL5)

After any of your Phantasms is shattered, you recover 【SL + 2】 Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.3CwZuXYCrgyKxpKm]{Phantasmal Recovery} (SL5)

Shatter one of your Phantasms to recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points. Shattering a Phantasm this way will not trigger the Phantasmal Echo Skill.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.bpbNh6wTEO9muDrX]{Phantasmal Recycling}

When you cast a spell, if you don't have enough MP to pay for its total cost, you may choose to shatter one of your Phantasms instead. Shattering a Phantasm this way will not trigger the Phantasmal Echo skill. You cannot use this skill to create a Phantasm.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.tgmv3ULFdtO1yMHO]{Ritual Illusionism}

You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Illusionism discipline.

Illusionism Rituals use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

PHANTASMS
